title: Counsel a Patient at Discharge
description: A discharge pharmacist is counseling a patient on their new medications before they go home from the hospital.

tasks.description: Review the patient's discharge medication list.
tasks.expected_outcome: Pharmacist knows which medications to discuss with the patient.

tasks.description: Explain the purpose, dose, and major side effects of each new medication to the patient.
tasks.expected_outcome: Pharmacist clearly communicates the important information for each drug.

tasks.description: Document in the EHR that discharge counseling was provided.
tasks.expected_outcome: The counseling session is documented, which is a key part of the discharge process.
